column2: IOWA DMV WRITTEN TEST
column6: IA

column2: Question Text
column6: Answer2 Text
column8: Answer3 Text

column2: 1. If your car goes into water, you should:
column4: wait for water to rush in and let it out in small breaths through your nose.
column6: remove yourself before it starts to sink.
column8: call the fire department immediately.

column2: 2. When passing other vehicles, drivers should:
column4: pass the vehicle as slowly as possible.
column6: make sure the passing lane is clear of traffic, and check behind and to the left to make sure another vehicle is not attempting to pass.
column8: apply the brake and slow down.

column2: 3. What type of pavement marking shows you which lane you must use for a turn?
column6: Diamond
column8: Edge line

column2: 4. This sign means:
column6: The divided highway on which drivers are traveling ends ahead.
column8: Roundabout ahead. Slow down.
column10: The highway ahead is divided into two one-way roadways.

column2: 5. If you are continually being passed on the right, you should:
column6: pull over to the right and stop until the road is clear.
column8: move into the right lane and allow other vehicles to pass you on the left.
column10: move into the left lane and allow other vehicles to pass you on the right.

column2: 6. This road sign means:
column6: Divided highway ahead
column8: Four-lane traffic ahead

column2: 7. When they see this sign, drivers should:
column4: be ready to shift to lower gear.
column6: be ready to brake sharply and stop.
column8: yield to trucks coming from the hill on the right.

column2: 8. This sign indicates:
column4: Do not use your phone while driving
column6: Phone service ahead
column8: Cell phone shop ahead

column2: 9. If you miss your exit on a freeway, do NOT:
column6: get back on the freeway in the opposite direction and return to the exit you want.
column8: continue on the freeway and find an alternative route.

column2: 10. To avoid having to make an emergency stop while driving in traffic, drivers should:
column4: look ahead and maintain a safe following distance.
column6: drive in the right lane only.
column8: sound their horn to warn other drivers.
column10: drive slower than the flow of traffic.

column2: 11. If a vehicle is approaching with high beams, drivers should look __________ until the vehicle passes.
column6: to the left of the road
column8: to the right of the road
column10: at the center of the road

column2: 12. An edge line that angles toward the center of the road indicates that:
column6: there’s a narrow bridge ahead.
column8: you must turn right.

column2: 13. When drivers come to this sign, they must:
column4: be ready to stop at the stop sign.
column6: brake sharply and come to a complete stop.
column8: warn other drivers that a stop sign is ahead.
column10: stop doing what they are doing.

column2: 14. In rainy weather, drivers should be most careful when turning or stopping:
column4: when it's been raining all day.
column6: during the first half hour of rain.
column8: after it has been raining for at least two hours.

column2: 15. As you drive on the expressway, make sure:
column4: you cut off vehicles behind you when you change lanes.
column6: your directional signal goes off before you change lanes.
column8: to signal all lane changes.

column2: 16. This sign is a:
column6: stop sign.
column8: guide sign.

column2: 17. What do flashing red lights on a school bus indicate?
column4: Traffic that approaches from either direction may proceed.
column6: The bus is stopped to load or discharge passengers.
column8: The bus is about to stop.
column10: You must pass the school bus.

column2: 18. You must come to a full stop at a yield sign:
column6: Never.
column8: If traffic conditions require it.
column10: Before you decrease speed and reach the intersection.

column2: 19. A traffic sign with a red circle around and a slash over a symbol means:
column4: the maneuver shown on the sign should be executed with extreme caution.
column6: the maneuver shown on the sign can be executed only after coming to a complete stop.
column8: the maneuver shown by the symbol is not allowed.
column10: Do not drive faster than the posted speed limit.

column2: 20. This road sign means:
column6: 4-way stop ahead
column8: There is a traffic signal ahead

column2: 21. The picture shows a _________ sign.
column6: no U-turn
column8: no sharp turn

column2: 22. This road sign means:
column4: Lane reduction - the right lane ends soon
column6: Lane reduction - the left lane ends soon
column8: Highway entrance ramp ahead

column2: 23. This road sign means:
column4: Vehicles turning left must make a U-turn.
column6: Sharp turn ahead.
column8: Drivers cannot make a complete turn to go in the opposite direction.
column10: Left turns are not allowed where this sign is displayed.

column2: 24. Drivers are required to stop:
column4: at an intersection with a stop sign.
column6: when a traffic officer orders them to stop.
column8: where there is a red light.

column2: 25. If your turn signals fail, you should use _____ to indicate your intention to turn.
column6: your high beams
column8: your emergency flashers

column2: 26. The gates at a railroad crossing are down and red lights are flashing. Drivers should:
column4: come to a complete stop, then drive around the gates.
column6: stop and proceed only when the gates are raised and the lights have stopped flashing.
column8: proceed with caution.

column2: 27. ABS is the acronym for:
column6: Anti-Buzz-Steering
column8: Anti-Braking System

column2: 28. When they see this sign, drivers should:
column4: slow down and keep well to the right.
column6: increase their speed and keep well to the right.
column8: slow down and keep well to the left.

column2: 29. When the traffic light is green, but traffic is blocking the intersection, drivers should:
column4: not enter the intersection until they can get completely across.
column6: enter the intersection and wait for traffic to clear.
column8: honk their horn to establish their right-of-way.

column2: 30. When driving in heavy rain, drivers should use:
column6: low beam headlights.
column8: high beam headlights.

column2: 31. This sign means:
column4: A road crosses the main highway ahead.
column6: The divided highway on which drivers are traveling ends ahead.
column8: Drivers are coming to a point where another traffic lane joins the one they are on.

column2: 32. A curb painted red means:
column4: Parking is for disabled persons with a special placard or plate.
column6: No parking or stopping
column8: Reserved for passengers pick up or drop off

column2: 33. What is the slow moving vehicle symbol?
column6: A reflective yellow diamond
column8: A reflective orange triangle

column2: 34. Flashing amber lights mean a school bus is:
column6: going to stop soon to load or unload school children.
column8: about to make a left turn.

column2: 35. A red traffic sign means?
column6: Construction warning.
column8: Stop.
